summary:
This is my first standalone more will be added later as time develops. Please remember this is my first mod.
She is in riverwood, in her own house you will need to turn off collision in the shop and loot the chest to get the key.
You can marry her!

Thanks to Ashes2Asherz for the main picture
descriptionHtml:
Optional but makes her look a little nice i think. (Fair Skin mod)

Thanks to:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4559665]Kalilies[/url] for KS hairdos Renewal
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1255344]Psychos1s[/url] for temptress mod
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/308756]LogRaam[/url] for eyes of beauty
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2950481]expired6978[/url] for Racemenu (finally got oldrim to use this)
Ashes2Asherz for MakAFK 2017
and T.A.P Gaming for his tutorial.

Although Celeste was my idea, i would like to give credit to these guys for giving me help and the resources to pull it off. Please do not redistribute this mod with out my permission.

Otherwise enjoy.

If you have any idea's or have edited the mod through Creation Kit and would like me to look at adding these things into the mod, Please please, please Contact me through the nexus

Possible Future Features
- Ridable Horse for Celeste
- Backstory through Dialogue (will not be voice acted sorry ((Don't have anyone who could play the role)))
- Her own Spells, Weapons and Armor
- Place me at command?
- Possible Expansion into a much bigger mod?
author: TheREALHayster
